info.name: NOTI Tests
info.description: Contains a series of tests to execute against NOTI.

item.name: application/json

request.description: Retrieves the `root` (`billboard`/`noti`) resource.
Creates a new audience and appends it to the audience collection.
Retrieves the audience with the `UUID` provided.
Replaces the current state of the audience with the `UUID` provided with the state provided.
Creates a new target and appends it to the target collection.
Retrieves the target with the `UUID` provided.
Replaces the state of the target with the `UUID` provided with the state provided.
Retrieves a representation of the notification collection resource.
Creates a new notification resource based on the representation provided.
Retrieves the notification resource representation with the UUID provided.
Replaces the state of the notification with the `UUID` provided with the state provided.
Removes the audience with the `UUID` provided.
Removes the target with the `UUID` provided.
Removes the notification resource with the UUID provided.

item.description: Performs protocol-related tests and verifications for `application/json` representations utilizing proactive negotiation.

request.description: Retrieves the `root` (`billboard`/`noti`) resource.
Retrieves a representation of the notification collection resource.
Creates a new audience and appends it to the audience collection.

Creates a new target and appends it to the target collection.
Retrieves the target with the `UUID` provided.
Replaces the state of the target with the `UUID` provided with the state provided.
Removes the audience with the `UUID` provided.
Removes the target with the `UUID` provided.

item.description: Performs protocol-related tests and verifications for `application/vnd.siren+json` representations utilizing proactive negotiation.
